name: Paper Nebula
storyline:
Paper spaceships... An alien infested nebula..... A mostly harmless A.I...... Roguelike!?!

Welcome to the Paper Nebula.

A loan protagonist attempting to escape an alien infested nebula, with the assistance of a legacy A.I. unit.

Why is the protagonist here? Who is the enemy?
Why are the sea creature based starships just so cute?
Wait..... why are they stickers???

Find out now, in the Paper Nebula!

"Acquire" alien technology to unlock shiny new weapons,
ensuring you have "just one more go!"
Improve your ships defence with shield and hull plating (boring but important).
Power up with ultimate abilities, like ship duplication, to inflict massive damage.

Encounter strange yet arduous bosses, and weep as they destroy your drone....this time.....but not next time.
Work with a snide yet [REDACTED] A.I. K11lR to survive and escape the Paper Nebula.
summary: Paper Nebula is a fast paced, arcade style scroller, reinvented as a Roguelike! This space shooter will have you blasting through endless waves of alien ships, to escape the Paper Nebula. With adorable paper style graphics and intense gameplay, you wouldn't want to be trapped anywhere else.
